text: Bernd Patzke (born 14 March 1943) is a German former football player and manager. The defender was twice a player of the West German national team for FIFA World Cup tournaments: 1966 in England and 1970 in Mexico. Altogether he won 24 caps between 1965 and 1971. ==Honours== 1860 Munich * Bundesliga: 1965â€“66 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:1966 FIFA World Cup players Category:1970 FIFA World Cup players Category:German football managers Category:Tennis Borussia Berlin managers
title: Bernd Patzke
